Title: stem
Description: Performs stemming on a given word.
language — Language which rules will be applied. Use the two letter ISO 639-1 code.word — word that needs to be stemmed. Must be in lowercase. String.
Examples: SELECT arrayMap(x -> stem('en', x), ['I', 'think', 'it', 'is', 'a', 'blessing', 'in', 'disguise']) as res;
